question.questionText: When switch X was open and switch Y was closed, why were bulbs B and C on?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Bulb B and Bulb C were still contained in the same closed path with the battery.
no path containing both the switch X and either bulb B or bulb C
There is a path with B and C that does not include X
